subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Stefan, I found one in German.
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Frank,

thanks, but unfortunately these sounds aren't uttered monotonously, so
they probably aren't be suitable for EVP.

Stefan

-- 

> Stefan,

> I found a site that has sound samples in many different languages. German is one of them!

> http://www.uiowa.edu/%7Eacadtech/phonetics/#

> Check it out! I will keep an eye open for more.

> Regards,

> Frank R.




>       ____________________________________________________________________________________
> You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
